org.modelio.gproject.data.ramc

Class ModelComponentArchive

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.data.ramc.ModelComponentArchive

  • public class ModelComponentArchive
extends Object
    Represents a model component (RAMC) archive.

    The archive may then be scanned for informations or deployed to a directory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelComponentArchive(Path path, boolean isArchive)
      Initialize the RAMC from a path that may represent a .ramc archive or an extracted RAMC directory.

    • Method Summary

      Get the RAMC informations from a file system mounted on the RAMC archive

      Get the RAMC information from a RAMC extracted to the given directory.

      Deploy the RAMC external files to the deployment directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelComponentArchive

        public ModelComponentArchive(Path path,
                     boolean isArchive)
        Initialize the RAMC from a path that may represent a .ramc archive or an extracted RAMC directory.
        Parameters:
        path - a file system path
        isArchive - true if the path is a .ramc file, false if the path is a directory.
